title: Barriers to Implementing Registered Nurse–Driven Clinical Decision Support for Antibiotic Stewardship: Retrospective Case Study
details: ER Stevens, L Xu, JE Kwon, S Tasneem, N Henning… - JMIR Formative Research, 2024
abstract: Background Up to 50% of antibiotic prescriptions for upper respiratory infections (URIs) are inappropriate. Clinical decision support (CDS) systems to mitigate unnecessary antibiotic prescriptions have been implemented into electronic health …
